words.source: H3651 prep. l- + adv. ken 'so, thus'; therefore; KJV 'wherefore', ESV 'therefore', NASB 'therefore'
H559 Qal imv. 2ms of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'say', ESV 'say', NASB 'say'
H1121 prep. l- + n.mp bene 'sons, children' in construct; KJV 'unto the children of', ESV 'to the people of', NASB 'to the sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H589 pron. 1cs ʾani 'I'; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H3318 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of יָצָא 'to go out; Hiphil: to bring out'; FIRST of four expressions of redemption; KJV 'I will bring you out', ESV 'I will bring you out', NASB 'I will bring you out'
H853 DOM + 2mp suff.; all trans. 'you'
H8478 prep. min + n.ms tachath 'under, beneath'; KJV 'from under', ESV 'from under', NASB 'from under'
H5450 n.fp sivloth 'burdens, forced labor' in construct; KJV 'the burdens of', ESV 'the burdens of', NASB 'the burdens of'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt'; KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'
H5337 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of נָצַל 'to deliver, rescue'; SECOND expression of redemption; KJV 'will rid', ESV 'will deliver', NASB 'will deliver'
H853 DOM + 2mp suff.; all trans. 'you'
H5656 prep. min + n.fs ʿavodah 'work, service, bondage' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'out of their bondage', ESV 'from slavery to them', NASB 'from their bondage'
H1350 conj. + Qal perf. 1cs of גָּאַל 'to redeem, act as kinsman-redeemer'; THIRD expression of redemption; KJV 'will redeem', ESV 'will redeem', NASB 'will redeem'
H853 DOM + 2mp suff.; all trans. 'you'
H2220 prep. b- + n.fs zeroaʿ 'arm, strength'; KJV 'with a stretched out arm', ESV 'with an outstretched arm', NASB 'with an outstretched arm'
H5186 Qal pass. ptc. fs of נָטָה 'to stretch out, extend'; KJV 'stretched out', ESV 'outstretched', NASB 'outstretched'
H8201 conj. + prep. b- + n.mp shephatim 'judgments, acts of judgment'; KJV 'great judgments', ESV 'great acts of judgment', NASB 'great judgments'
H1419 adj.mp gadol 'great'; KJV 'great', ESV 'great', NASB 'great'
